title_localized.en: Does Apple Core Hotels charge a resort fee?

faq_content_localized.en: The hotel has a daily Facilities Surcharge of $18 plus 8.875% tax, or $19.60USD daily. This is a mandatory daily fee for facility use and amenities bundle, inclusive of continental breakfast, premium Wi-Fi for up to six streaming devices per room during your stay, unlimited local and domestic long-distance telephone calls and messaging, and, where applicable, 24-hour use of business and fitness centers.
